SELECT se.id, se.supplier_id, se.`year`, se.quality_score, se.cost_socre, se.delivery_score, se.service_score, se.innovation_score, se.financial_score, se.score, se.create_date, se.content, se.formula, se.del_flag,
si.CODE AS supplierCode, si.NAME AS supplierName, si.charge_person, si.phone, si.images AS supplierImages, FROM supplier_evaluate se LEFT JOIN supplier_info si ON (si.id = se.supplier_id) WHERE 1 = 1 AND se.del_flag = 0
AND se.`year` = #{queryForm.year}
AND si.NAME like CONCAT("%",#{queryForm.supplierName},"%")
ORDER BY se.create_date DESC
